name: LSLWelder
short_description:
An implementation of a JavaCC parser for the Linden Scripting Language (LSL) used in Second Life.

The program contains various optimisers and preprocessor comments to support including, inlining and optimised removal of "dead code", essentially reimplementing the basic Haskel functionality in LSLPlus/LSLForge.

While lacking the emulated simulator functionality of the above named package it's hoped that the rewrite in a better known language along with a simplification of the parser's goals will make it easier to maintain and debug going forth.
summary: JavaCC parser and optimiser for the LSL language
